txt.en: Chapter 3.10: Enemies of Anfalas
Return to Lond Cirion to report of your successes

'Lady Marra's scouts patrol the lands hereabout in search of Corsair raiding parties, and I have offered to them the assistance of my travelling companions, many of whom are deadly with weapons of every sort. I count you in this number, [placeholder], and would greatly appreciate your aiding the scouts as they seek such foes as trouble Anfalas.\n\n'The scouts have gone in three directions: to the north, the east, and to the south.'
Talk to Caebar in the central yard of Lond Cirion
'You are here to help oppose the enemies of Anfalas? I am pleased to hear it, for I surprised a number of Corsairs creeping about those rocks, and I believe they will soon return!'
'TBD - Blah!'
'Corsairs sometimes try to approach Lond Cirion from this beach, so we must remain always vigilant.'
'Corsair scouts have been spotted inland, and we must always remain on our guard.'

'Oh, I am glad you have returned, [placeholder]. King Elessar asked for me to attend to some business about an hour from now, and I am consumed with worry about what it might be. I am trying not to be nervous, but it is... well, it is difficult.'
Borion thanks you for the help
Galleth thanks you for the help
King Elessar has offered the help of his companions in the defence of Anfalas, and that includes any assistance you can provide to Lady Marra's scouts.
Gilvenel thanks you for the help
Lady Marra's scouts can be found outside Lond Cirion to the north, east, and south.
'What did I tell you? Corsairs approach!'
'You have the thanks of Lond Cirion, my friend!'
Talk to Borion north of Lond Cirion
Now that you have aided the scouts, you should return to Lond Cirion.
'To speak it makes it so!'
Defend Borion
Caebar is in the central yard of Lond Cirion. He seems worried about something.
'Always we oppose them! You have my thanks!'
Talk to Galleth on the beach south of Lond Cirion
Defend Galleth
Talk to Gilvenel on the hill east of Lond Cirion
Defend Gilvenel
Caebar calls you over to him. He seems worried
'I was right! Here they come!'
'Thank you, my friend!'

'Lady Marra's scouts patrol the lands hereabout in search of Corsair raiding parties, and I have offered to them the assistance of my travelling companions, many of whom are deadly with weapons of every sort. I count you in this number, [placeholder], and would greatly appreciate your aiding the scouts as they seek such foes as trouble Anfalas.\n\n'The scouts have gone in three directions: to the north, east, and south.'
